Terrible experience at this store.  I asked three times for a specific type of jeans, but the store assistant kept pushing the boyfriend jeans on me, saying they'd look great. While I appreciated her recommendation, I was clear that I wanted to try the jeans I requested. Instead of helping, she made unsolicited comments about how the jeans I wanted wouldnâ€™t suit me, saying they'd make me look bigger and werenâ€™t flattering. It was completely uncalled for and rude. Iâ€™ve worn that style before, and I love how they look, which is why I wanted to buy them again. After I insisted on trying them, she then conveniently claimed they were out of stock.

If you're looking for Leviâ€™s jeans, I strongly suggest going somewhere else where the staff is respectful and attentive to your requests. There's no reason to spend your money in a store that makes you feel uncomfortable and disrespected.
Very prompt and fantastic service. Great outlet to get your Leviâ€™s.

Visited at around 940pm on 4th July.
Never been to Leviâ€™s for decades and missed this retro brand from my teens especially the 501.
The Malay lady who attended to me, forgot to ask for her name, was really attentive and friendly. Giving suggestions and even passing me more styles under the fitting door to try out.
I cannot remember the last time I enjoyed retail service already. Too bad I didnâ€™t like the fitting, was really hoping to buy something from her.
Hope she can keep up her warm personality. ğŸ‘ğŸ¼

The Jeans that last a life-time. It is no wonder I own only 2 pairs so far. 2nd pair gets 50% off (Dec'22) great promotion. 510 is an awesome and stretchable skinny/slim-fit design that is cheaper than Malaysia and Thailand from my recent cost comparison.
